title: "Ne m'ôte point ce que tu ne scaurois me doner"
medium: red chalk, pen, bister ink, and wash heightened with white
credit_line: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff
provenance_text:
Michel-François Dandré-Bardon [1700-1783], Paris, France. Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff, Colonia, NJ, by June 12, 1974 [1]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1976.

Notes:
[1]. Daniel and Jane Fishkoff loaned the work to the Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute in June 1974; see curatorial file for original loan form and list of works.
